T02D3690:325a-4: rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3690:325a-5: lam du 'gro ba la chom rkun mi 'ong bar
T02D3690:325a-6: bya ba'i phyir them pa nas gom pa bdun gzhal
T02D3690:325a-7: pa'i sa nas lag pa g-yas pas sa sbar ba
T02D3690:325a-8: gang blangs la / de nas rang skad cig gis rje btsun mar bskyed la /
T02D3690:325a-9: skyabs 'gro dang sems bskyed tshul bzhin du byas la /
T02D3690:325a-10: lag pa g-yas pa'i sa de lam las ri rab tsam du bskyed de /
T02D3690:325a-11: lag pa g-yon du bam las rgya mtsho chen por bskyed la /
T02D3690:325a-12: dmigs pa de ring bdag la gnod par byed pa'i chom rkun thams cad mdun du bkug ste /
T02D3690:325a-13: mi'i tshig gis bar mchod par sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02D3690:325a-14: aom t'a re tu tt'a re tu re aasma aa
T02D3690:325a-15: pa ka ra sarba tsoo r'a bandha bandha sv'a h'a
T02D3690:325a-17: mdun gyi chom rkun pa thams cad rgya mtsho chen por blugs la /
T02D3690:325a-18: g-yas kyi sa de g-yon du spos la ri rab kyis mnan par bsam mo //
T02D3690:325a-19: de nas sa de thu ba g-yon par bcings te
T02D3690:325a-20: 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i gnas su dgrol bar bya'o
T02D3690:325a-21: // 'gro ba'i dus su sgrol ma'i bstod pa la sogs pa sgrogs shing 'gro'o //
T02D3690:325a-22: chom rkun bcing ba zhes bya ba'i rim pa rdzogs so /
T02D3690:325a-24: // / ma h'a pandi ta shr'i ratna rakshi ta dang /
